name: Agreement
title: Agreement
description: Master agreement in Spanish adjectives with comprehensive examples and practice
learningObjectives: Understand the concept and usage of agreement
Apply agreement rules correctly in context
Identify agreement in Spanish texts and speech
Use agreement accurately in written and spoken Spanish

exercises.instructions: Make adjectives agree with nouns in agreement

prompts.explanation: Adjective agrees with feminine singular noun
Adjective agrees with masculine plural noun

exercises.instructions: Place adjectives in the correct position

prompts.explanation: Descriptive adjectives usually follow the noun
Bueno shortens to buen before masculine singular nouns

questions.question: Which adjective agrees correctly?
questions.explanation: Adjective must agree in gender and number
